alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:20PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Luverne affecting Rock County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River above Hawarden. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, some farm houses on the South Dakota side of the river are isolated by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 25.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Sioux River Hawarden 20.5 19.9 Sun 10 pm 23.8 24.9 24.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
